title: Did the Trump administration refuse Puerto Rico's request to allow the use of food stamps for hot meals?
subtitle: The Ministry of Agriculture agreed to lift the usual ban on "hot foods" for the purchase of food stamps and rejected the previous exemption request.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Department of Agriculture rejected a request from Puerto Rico for a waiver of the rules of the nutrition assistance programme so that beneficiaries of food stamps could use EBT cards to purchase hot foods.
